name: Rage Bandethan
description:
I wanted to mix a game that has recently made me rage which is the crash n'sane trilogy. the puzzles and challenges were so difficult it genuinely made me rage at times.

Another thing about unity that made me think was that the default ethan character physics is so annoying. i thought combing these two elements would make for a rage filled experience leaving the player fuming!

So i did i combined both elements as best i could with as little time as possible, baring in mind i went this solo ;)

The game is far from complete though i did manage to get most of the modelling into the game, except they dont have any code attached as i ran out of time. there were a lot more challenges i wanted to add so as a secret level which fully completes the game. sound and music mechanics to add further annoyance. a lot more gameplay was not added. 

I believe if the game that i had in mind actually was fully complete it would rival "unfair mario". However i di manage to get what i meant across with level almost complete and the annoying physics of ethan playable. so enjoy the game and please give me feedback, it would be much appreciated and hilarious to know your experience.
